10#include "modules/video_coding/svc/scalable_video_controller_no_layering.h"
11
12#include <utility>
13#include <vector>
14
15#include "api/transport/rtp/dependency_descriptor.h"
16#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
17
18namespace webrtc {
19
20ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering::~ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering() =
21 default;
22
23ScalableVideoController::StreamLayersConfig
24ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering::StreamConfig() const {
25 StreamLayersConfig result;
26 result.num_spatial_layers = 1;
27 result.num_temporal_layers = 1;
28 return result;
29}
30
31FrameDependencyStructure
32ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering::DependencyStructure() const {
33 FrameDependencyStructure structure;
34 structure.num_decode_targets = 1;
35 structure.num_chains = 1;
36 structure.decode_target_protected_by_chain = {0};
37
38 FrameDependencyTemplate key_frame;
39 key_frame.decode_target_indications = {DecodeTargetIndication::kSwitch};
40 key_frame.chain_diffs = {0};
41 structure.templates.push_back(key_frame);
42
43 FrameDependencyTemplate delta_frame;
44 delta_frame.decode_target_indications = {DecodeTargetIndication::kSwitch};
45 delta_frame.chain_diffs = {1};
46 delta_frame.frame_diffs = {1};
47 structure.templates.push_back(delta_frame);
48
49 return structure;
50}
51
52std::vector<ScalableVideoController::LayerFrameConfig>
53ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering::NextFrameConfig(bool restart) {
54 if (!enabled_) {
55 return {};
56 }
57 std::vector<LayerFrameConfig> result(1);
58 if (restart || start_) {
59 result[0].Id(0).Keyframe().Update(0);
60 } else {
61 result[0].Id(0).ReferenceAndUpdate(0);
62 }
63 start_ = false;
64 return result;
65}
66
67GenericFrameInfo ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering::OnEncodeDone(
68 const LayerFrameConfig& config) {
69 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(config.Id(), 0);
70 GenericFrameInfo frame_info;
71 frame_info.encoder_buffers = config.Buffers();
72 if (config.IsKeyframe()) {
73 for (auto& buffer : frame_info.encoder_buffers) {
74 buffer.referenced = false;
75 }
76 }
77 frame_info.decode_target_indications = {DecodeTargetIndication::kSwitch};
78 frame_info.part_of_chain = {true};
79 return frame_info;
80}
81
82void ScalableVideoControllerNoLayering::OnRatesUpdated(
83 const VideoBitrateAllocation& bitrates) {
84 enabled_ = bitrates.GetBitrate(0, 0) > 0;
85}
86
87} // namespace webrtc
